title: Sri Lanka seeks NZ support for energy
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Minister of Power and Energy Kanchama Wijesekara tweeted saying that he discussed current crisis management plans with the High Commissioner for New Zealand in Sri Lanka at the Ministry of Power and Energy on Monday (30).
He noted that the discussions were on the immediate and long-term plans for the renewable and energy sectors, and how New Zealand can support the transformation.
World Bank to disburse USD 700Mn to Sri Lanka, Country Director disagrees
